participant_1.background:
I bought a soccer ball with my first paycheck.
My favorite websites include scuba diving blogs and movie review sites.
i like rap music.
i m allergic to apples yet still eat them.
my mother raised me by herself while working two jobs.

participant_2.background:
I once got a paper cut on my finger while delivering a shipment to a university.
I went to Japan and spent my days trying new foods and exploring the city.
my last name is spanish , but i tell people that its italian.
I would chew my food slowly as a kid and my dad would always tell me to hurry up.
I am still haunted by the events of that day, but I am trying to move on with my life.

content.text: Hello there!
Hello how are you?
I'm great! What do you do for work?
I work in a warehouse and deliver packages. It's a lot of work but I like it.
That sounds like hard work. What's your favorite part of the job?
I like meeting new people and exploring new areas. I recently delivered a package to a university and got a paper cut on my finger.
Oh no! That sounds painful. Are you alright now?
Yeah, I'm all good. It was just a small cut.
I'm glad to hear that. So, what's your favorite food?
I love trying new foods. I went to Japan recently and spent my days trying new foods and exploring the city.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've always wanted to go to Japan.
You should! It's an amazing place.
I definitely will. So, what's your favorite rap song?
I don't really listen to rap music. I'm more of a classic rock fan.
Oh, I see. I like some classic rock too.
What's your favorite classic rock song?
I like Stairway to Heaven by Led Zeppelin.
That's a good song. I like it too.
Nice! So, what's your favorite movie?
I like a lot of different movies. I don't really have a favorite.
Me neither. I like a lot of different types of movies too.
Well, it was nice talking to you. I have to go now.
You too. Have a nice day!
You too!
